Title: The Dance at Silver Gulch
Writer: Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson, Josephine Rector
Actors: Josephine Rector, Harry Todd, Arthur Mackley
Plot: A dance is held one night at Silver Gulch Hall, and Joe Barton attends, in company with Mildred, his sweetheart. One unwelcome guest is Jim Silver, a cowpuncher, who is an old sweetheart of Mildred's. Mildred's refusal to dance wi...
